title: I cannot install League of Legends
body: I just bought a new laptop and for the past 7 hours have been trying to install league but keep getting the "unspecified error occurred" error and the patcher never finishes downloading, I'm getting extremely frustrated and would appreciate any help.

replies.body:
Hey

Wish I had a new laptop!! :)  Sucks that you are having problems getting League to install though.

First up - have you tried some of the steps in the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support page?

Let me know how you go

Cheers!
Mindstar

I seem to have fixed the patching issue but have run into another problem, every time i press the "launch" button, the client will fade out as usual but nothing will appear afterwards, just wondering if you have a possible solution to this? Thanks for your help :)

Are you getting stuck at 33%?

Look at [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/bopn7Om1-unspecified-error-while-installing).
